title: Some1 explain
body: Can some1 pls explain me why we have massive healing in lane? why do i even play laningphase ? i literally poke my enemy down to 25% hp and he stays in lane because he heals back up to 100% hp what da hell???? can we actually remove this stupidity out of the game god damn ? if i dont get a gank or towerdive my enemy with another teammember ill never be able to kill him because he just heals up over 5 sec.
